-- | Code used by Patch-Shack that seemed sensible to open for reusability
--   
--   Parse darcs output
@package DarcsHelpers
@version 0.1

module Darcs.Helpers.Parse
prsPatch :: XMLParser Patch
data Patch
Patch :: PatchAuthor -> PatchDate -> PatchLocalDate -> PatchInverted -> PatchHash -> PatchContents -> Patch
patchAuthor :: Patch -> PatchAuthor
patchDate :: Patch -> PatchDate
patchLocalDate :: Patch -> PatchLocalDate
patchInverted :: Patch -> PatchInverted
patchHash :: Patch -> PatchHash
patchMessage :: Patch -> PatchContents
newtype PatchAuthor
PatchAuthor :: String -> PatchAuthor
newtype PatchDate
PatchDate :: String -> PatchDate
newtype PatchLocalDate
PatchLocalDate :: String -> PatchLocalDate
newtype PatchInverted
PatchInverted :: Bool -> PatchInverted
newtype PatchHash
PatchHash :: String -> PatchHash
newtype PatchContents
PatchContents :: String -> PatchContents
xmlParseTidy :: [Char] -> Either String (Document Posn)
instance Read PatchContents
instance Show PatchContents
instance Eq PatchContents
instance Read PatchHash
instance Show PatchHash
instance Eq PatchHash
instance Read PatchInverted
instance Show PatchInverted
instance Eq PatchInverted
instance Read PatchLocalDate
instance Show PatchLocalDate
instance Eq PatchLocalDate
instance Read PatchDate
instance Show PatchDate
instance Eq PatchDate
instance Read PatchAuthor
instance Show PatchAuthor
instance Eq PatchAuthor
instance Read Patch
instance Show Patch
instance Eq Patch

module Darcs.Helpers
